last_episode_to_air.name: SUPER CROOKS
last_episode_to_air.overview: Christopher Matts sends Praetorian to stop Johnny and his crew — but this time, the supervillains have Gladiator on their side.

name: Super Crooks
original_name: スーパー・クルックス
overview: Johnny Bolt recruits a group of ragtag supervillains for one last heist. Their target: A ruthless super-powered crime boss. What can go wrong?

episodes.name: Electro Boy
episodes.overview: A regular kid named Johnny Bolt suddenly finds that he can control electricity. Soon enough, he starts testing the limits of his newfound powers.

episodes.name: Kasey
episodes.overview: As soon as he's released from prison, Johnny meets up with his old supervillain friends, who try to pull him into a very intriguing gem heist.

episodes.name: Man Mountain
episodes.overview: Things don't go as planned with the heist, and Johnny and the crew end up getting chased by cops and superheroes through the streets of San Francisco.

episodes.name: The Praetorian
episodes.overview: Johnny and his friends are confronted by Praetorian, a superhero who relishes using his seemingly endless abilities to punish them.

episodes.name: The Heat
episodes.overview: In Chicago, Carmine introduces Johnny and Kasey to the other supervillains. They've all been chosen for their specific powers and their nameless status.

episodes.name: The Gladiator
episodes.overview: Carmine and his crew steal a plane and fly off to rescue TK, who's on a heavily guarded aircraft protected by Gladiator.

episodes.name: The Supermax
episodes.overview: While waiting for the final member of their crew to show up, Carmine shares his plan with everyone else and gives them one last chance to drop out.

episodes.name: The Union of Justice
episodes.overview: The night before hitting the Union of Justice headquarters, Johnny and Kasey have an early celebration and vow to walk away from crime after this heist.

episodes.name: Count Orlok
episodes.overview: While confronting their old friend Praetorian, Carmine and the crew realize they've made a major miscalculation and have to think on their feet.

episodes.name: Carmine
episodes.overview: Johnny's old supervillain buddies take him out for a celebration and as usual, try to pull him into one last harebrained job.

episodes.name: Casino Grand Granite
episodes.overview: To save Carmine, Johnny tries to get the crew back together for another heist he's planned using information he gathered while serving time in supermax.

episodes.name: The Bastard
episodes.overview: Kasey and Roddy disguise themselves as professors for a meeting with Christopher Matts while Carmine, Johnny, TK and Josh case the casino.

episodes.name: SUPER CROOKS
episodes.overview: Christopher Matts sends Praetorian to stop Johnny and his crew — but this time, the supervillains have Gladiator on their side.
